00003 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00004 import newtonERP.common.NaturalMap;
00005 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.colorViewer.ColorViewer;
00006 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.ScrollListViewable;
00007 
00012 public class ScrollListViewer
00013 {
00018         public static String getHtmlContent(ScrollListViewable entity)
00019 
00020         {
00021                 String html = "";
00022 
00023                 html += "<div class=\"scrollableDivPair\" style=\"border-color:"
00024                                 + ColorViewer.getColor(entity.getTitle()) + "\"><div>";
00025 
00026                 if (entity.getTitleUrl() != null)
00027                         html += "<a href=\"" + entity.getTitleUrl() + "\">";
00028 
00029                 if (entity.getTitle() != null)
00030                         html += "<b>" + entity.getTitle() + "</b>";
00031 
00032                 if (entity.getTitleUrl() != null)
00033                         html += "</a>";
00034 
00035                 html += "<ul>";
00036 
00037                 for (String linkName : entity.getLinkList().keySet())
00038                         html += "<li><a href=\"" + entity.getLinkList().get(linkName)
00039                                         + "\">" + linkName + "</a></li>";
00040 
00041                 for (NaturalMap<String, String> linkPair : entity.getLinkGroupList())
00042                 {
00043                         int counter = 0;
00044                         String styleModifier;
00045                         html += "<li>";
00046                         for (String linkName : linkPair.getKeyList())
00047                         {
00048                                 if (counter > 0)
00049                                         styleModifier = " class=\"linkPairTarget\"";
00050                                 else
00051                                         styleModifier = "";
00052                                 html += "<a href=\"" + linkPair.get(linkName) + "\""
00053                                                 + styleModifier + ">" + linkName + "</a>";
00054 
00055                                 if (counter == linkPair.size() - 1)
00056                                         html += "</li>";
00057                                 else
00058                                         html += " : ";
00059                                 counter++;
00060                         }
00061                         // html += "</li>";
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 html += "</ul>";
00065 
00066                 html = html.replace("<ul></ul>", "");
00067 
00068                 for (ActionLink actionLink : entity.getActionLinkList())
00069                         html += LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(actionLink);
00070 
00071                 html += "</div></div>";
00072 
00073                 return html;
00074         }
00075 }
